actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill regarding the sale and transfer of Moskit anti-ship missiles by the Russian Federation.
short_title: Russian Anti-Ship Missile Nonproliferation Act of 2000

summary.text: Russian Anti-Ship Missile Nonproliferation Act of 2000 - Prohibits the President from rescheduling or forgiving any outstanding bilateral debt owed by the Russian Federation to the United States, until the President certifies to Congress that the Russian Federation has permanently terminated all transfers of Moskit anti-ship missiles that endanger U.S. national security, particularly transfers to China. Requires the President, after making such certification, to report periodically to specified congressional committees, identifying the status of any contract and the date of the transfer of any version of the Moskit missile (particularly transfers to China) occurring on or after June 1, 2000.
